department: Department of Public Works and Government Services
description: Audio-visual equipment and services for the Department of National Defence
full_summary:
## Audio-Visual Event Support GENERAL STREAM

### Reference and Solicitation Information

**Reference Number:** WS4417687891
**Solicitation Number:** WS4417687891
**Update:** This solicitation has been **CANCELLED**.

### Tender Information and Requirements

*   **Classification:** SRV
*   **Procurement Type:** Request for Standing Offer
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Evaluation Criteria:** Lowest Price
*   **Tender Deadline:** **2:00 PM EDT, March 11, 2024**

**Pre-qualified Contractors:** Please note that due to unforeseen circumstances, a sole source is still anticipated to be awarded. Pre-qualification information was posted on the Canada Buys website but is currently **cancelled**.



### Goods and Services

**Description of Requirements:** The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND), is seeking a contractor to provide video and combination video and audio presentation equipment and hardware and controllers as well as audio and visual equipment, audiovisual equipment accessories, photographic or filming or video equipment, educational material audio tape, audio visual services, teleconference equipment and hardware and controllers, audio and visual equipment, and other relevant goods and services.

**Frequency of Delivery:** Irregular deliveries in Ontario

**Contact Information:**

*   **Jessica Canas, PSPC/SAPC**
    *   Email: [jessica.canas@tpsgc-tpgsc.gc.ca](mailto:jessica.canas@tpsgc-tpgsc.gc.ca)
    *   Phone:** (555) 123-4567
        **Fax:** (555) 123-4568

### Terms and Conditions

*   **Tender Closing Time:** All bids must be submitted by the set closing time of 2:00 PM EDT on March 11, 2024. Submission bids after 2:00 PM will not be accepted. Registrations must be completed and confirmed through the Ariba Discovery website.

Please note that all bids must be received before the specified date and time and not after, due to a new tender notice that was posted.
